title: Cant reconnect to games
body:
Frequently cant get through to load  screen without restarting computer. 
Once in game i dc' and cant reconnect at all. 
Says I have firewall issue, tried all known fixes. 
Problem is recent as of 2 weeks. 
Longer Dc's 3-10mins rather than 10-30secs

replies.body: What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
